email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 75,000 MT of coal from Richards Bay to Shanghai. Could you provide your best freight rate and vessel availability for this cargo? We are looking for a laycan around November 15-20, 2023.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN QUEEN, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m, for your shipment. Our starting freight rate is USD 25 per MT on a CIF basis. The laycan can be adjusted to November 15-20 as requested.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith
Chartering Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to USD 23 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We can adjust the freight rate to USD 24 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 6,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

USD 24 per MT and a demurrage rate of USD 6,000 per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Lisa
